title: Remove forced beyhubx.com redirect and hard-coded canonical metadata

requirements.summary: Remove the hard-coded host redirect so the app does not force navigation to beyhubx.com.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the app on a non-beyhubx.com host does not trigger a redirect to beyhubx.com.
The app loads successfully on the platform’s default/working deployment URL.

file_operations.description: Remove the inline domain redirect script that forces navigation to the canonicalHost 'beyhubx.com' so the app remains reachable on non-beyhubx.com hosts.

requirements.summary: Stop hard-coding beyhubx.com in canonical and social preview URL metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer contains canonical/OG/Twitter URL values that are hard-coded to https://beyhubx.com/.
The app’s HTML head remains valid and includes title/description metadata without breaking the build.

file_operations.description: Update/replace the canonical link and og:url/twitter:url meta tags so they are not hard-coded to https://beyhubx.com/ (e.g., remove these URL tags entirely or make them relative/non-domain-specific), while keeping existing title/description metadata intact.
